sectionDegreeAttributes: Camp Honors/Chanc Schol, and Literature and the Arts course.
sectionText: The class meets twice per week: once on Mondays, and a second time to attend performances and/or exhibitions at Krannert Center for the Performing Arts and/or Krannert Art Museum. Event dates will vary. Admission to all events will be provided without charge to students enrolled in the course. The class meets in Lecture Room (109) in the Dance Administration Building, 907 1/2 W. Nevada Street, Urbana.
